oes not speak to us on the frank's box nor will it communicate through eith=
er me or my partner, Jay. We are both mediums. It slams and bangs in the ho=
use almost ceaselessly at night. It hits the walls, windows, the tv, the be=
dside tables and the doors. I am at a loss as to how to otherwise communica=
te because as I said with the 2 boxes we have, it won't speak.

I am open t=
o any and all suggestions. We have told it to go, tried many different sugg=
ested rituals and to no avail. It will go quiet for a day to three days aft=
er ritual work but begins again, only louder.

Please, if anyone can help o=
r direct us to someone who can I would be most grateful.
